
const mongoose = require('mongoose');


const Employees = new mongoose.Schema({
    Fristname: {
        type: String,
    },
    lastname: {
        type:String
    },
    address: {
        type:String
    },
    email: {
        type:String
    },
    phone_number: {
        type:String
    },
    store: {
        type:String
    },
    Hire_date: {
        type:String
    }
})

module.exports = mongoose.model('Employees', Employees)
